issue.title: [C++] Add support for the dictionary type in the C++ ORC writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11197](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11197). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We might need dictionary type support in order to process categorical types in Pandas correctly.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11197?focusedCommentId=17567300) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
This issue has been inactive for 3 months, so it has been unassigned and marked as unstarted. If you are still working on this, feel free to reassign yourself and resume progress.
